item.description:
Hi Incubators!!

Come on by my backyard tonight aka Friday for an outdoor campfire, smores, board game night!!

We'll be playing board games in my backyard til at least midnight so feel free to drop by at any time!  Oh and ok we might sneak in some improv too, but shhh....

And in the spirit of giving, its a volunteer potluck event.  Meaning if you have the time and/or a few dollars to chip in, make some food, bring some food, but by all means just be there regardless.

We'll be tehre starting at 7:30pm and going til probably around midnight!!  And yes we are starting a fire but surely bring a jacket for the brisk cool evening of taking on myself in some chess or chinese checkers!

Bring it! and let's have a blast!

Looking forward to an awesome time with you all!

Peace, laughter, and basic human goodness,

Jason

 

p.s. any questions let me know?  Oh and no previous board game experience is required, lol
item.how_to_find_us: In the backyard with board games galore!
item.name: Tonight!!! Free Friday night Board Game Night!!
